set.name: DMRP-04魔 The Rise of Master Dolszak!! ~Demon Phoenix of Moonless Night~

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have 11 or more Jokers in the battle zone and/or your mana zone you may cast this spell for no cost. ■ Count your creatures in the battle zone. This turn, one of your creatures breaks that number of additional shields and while that creature's attacking, your opponent can't cast spells.

Then return a spell from your graveyard to your hand.

property.value: DMRP-04魔 The Rise of Master Dolszak!! ~Demon Phoenix of Moonless Night~

property.name: Race
property.value: Mafi Gang/Magic Tool

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then choose a darkness card from your graveyard and put it into your hand. ■ Your Magic Tool creatures cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-04魔 The Rise of Master Dolszak!! ~Demon Phoenix of Moonless Night~

property.name: Rules
property.value: {JOE} 2 Jokers Over Explode 2 (You may reduce this creature's summon cost by 2. If you do, put this creature on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn. Then draw a card.) ■ When this creature would be discarded by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of a creature, you may put it into the battle zone instead. {DOUBLE BREAKER} {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, put all Jokers into your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-04魔 The Rise of Master Dolszak!! ~Demon Phoenix of Moonless Night~

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. ■ Whenever your opponent's creatures attack, they attack this creature if able. ■ If there are 5 or more creatures that have power 12000 or more in your mana zone, this creature gets "shield trigger".

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-04魔 The Rise of Master Dolszak!! ~Demon Phoenix of Moonless Night~

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. {SUPER}When you put this creature into the battle zone, tap all creatures.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-04魔 The Rise of Master Dolszak!! ~Demon Phoenix of Moonless Night~

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put a non-evolution Light dragon creature that costs 7 or less from your hand. That creature gets "blocker" until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-04魔 The Rise of Master Dolszak!! ~Demon Phoenix of Moonless Night~

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ When you put this creature, draw a card. Then choose one of your opponent's creatures and return to its owner's hand. {SUPER}When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may cast a spell that costs 9 or less from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-04魔 The Rise of Master Dolszak!! ~Demon Phoenix of Moonless Night~

property.name: Rules

That creature gets -3000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) {SUPER}When you put this creature, put any number of creatures that cost 4 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.value: {GATE OF MOONLESS NIGHT}: When you put a Magic Tool, you may choose 2 of your Magic Tools in the battle zone and your graveyard and summon this creature from your hand or graveyard onto those 4 cards for no cost. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ If there are 4 or more cards under this creature, your opponent's creatures are put tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ATTACK CHANCE}: Master Dragon (When one of your Master Dragons attacks, you may cast this spell for no cost.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. They don't untap at the start of their next turn. ■ You may untap all your Master Dragons. ■ After you cast this spell from your hand, put it on top of one of your shields face up instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {QUATTRO BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all creatures that have less than 12000 power into their owner's mana zone. ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, you may put a non-evolution creature that costs 10 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone. ■ Cards can't be put on top of this creature.
